entry.title: if i love you less, will you love me more?
entry.summary:
Author: sumsie

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,375Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: After the worst year Beacon Hills has seen, Stiles Stilinski survives by staying useful. He helps on hunts, works nights at the sheriff’s station, and refuses to slow down long enough to feel what the war left behind. Derek Hale lives on the edge of town and further from everyone else. He fights because it is easier than grieving. When Stiles becomes a constant presence, Derek allows it, not out of kindness, but because Stiles understands violence and silence too well. What grows between them is intense and unbalanced. Derek offers protection without comfort. Stiles offers devotion without limits. Their bond is forged in blood and aftermath, mistaken for love when it is really shared damage. As threats close in, Stiles begins to lose himself in Derek’s shadow, learning too late that survival is not the same as being cared for.

entry.summary:
Author: DemonTeen97

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,670Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 151

Summary: Stiles has always been the one who is overlooked, but what if a certain Sourwolf gave him a chance. Stiles was happy. Stiles loved Derek. Maybe he should have asked what Derek saw in him. Maybe he should have seen the red flags for what they were. All it took was one phone call, on what should have been the start of the most EPIC summers, thats all it took to destroy everything he thought was real. They want him to shut up. Fine. entry.title: The Weight of Wings
entry.summary:
Author: QueenRumi21

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,316Chapters: 6/16Kudos: 116

Summary: Stiles Stilinski thought turning eighteen would mean college applications, sleepless nights, and maybe finally admitting he had a crush on one very broody Alpha werewolf. He did not expect wings. Overnight, Stiles learns the truth his father has kept hidden his whole life: he isn’t human. He’s a Nephilim—half-angel, half-human, dangerously powerful, and growing stronger by the day. With a pair of pure white wings and abilities he can’t control, Stiles is forced to confront a past he never knew existed… and a destiny he never asked for. As the pack scrambles to understand what Stiles is becoming, Derek Hale feels something inside him stir—something ancient, instinctive, impossible to ignore. A connection he can’t explain. A bond he can’t run from. Secrets unravel. Powers awaken.And the weight of wings is heavier than Stiles ever imagined. Nephilim Stiles. Protective Derek. Pack feels. Slow burn Sterek.Family drama, supernatural lore, found family, and a boy learning what it means to be more than human.

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 121,509Chapters: 43/45Kudos: 210

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive. The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation. As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,938Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 53

Summary: “Well,” Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, “at least this time he didn’t almost get us all killed.”Derek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. “I was drunk.” They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It’s steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. “You were careless,” she says. Not angry. Not loud. Certain. “You are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.” Derek nods once, reflexive. “When you speak,” Talia continues, “you do so as a Hale. As Alpha blood. Your indulgences do not absolve you of that.” ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions, and a mistake he keeps repeating.

entry.title: Stiles and the wolf plushie
entry.summary:
Author: Babyexecutioner

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,742Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 27
